      Overridden in AssocWithThreadResourcePool to fetch the resource cached in the ThreadLocal In ConnectionPool this simply returns null.
      protected ResourceHandle AssocWithThreadResourcePool.prefetch(ResourceSpec spec, ResourceAllocator alloc, Transaction tran)
      Prefetch is called to check whether there there is a free resource is already associated with the thread Only when prefetch is unable to find a resource, normal routine (getUnenlistedResource) will happen.
